models.sentence:
The mice were divided into eight groups randomly.

The models mentioned in the article are:

* Apoptotic I (4T1 tumor-bearing mice induced by DOX)
* Apoptotic II (4T1 tumor-bearing mice induced by DOX twice for 3 d)
* Normal group (4T1 tumor-bearing mice without treatment of DOX)

These groups are used to evaluate the amplifying apoptosis-targeted property of MNPs

drug formulations explored.sentence: The article has successfully developed ZnDPA-conjugated Fe@Fe3O4 NPs by strain-promoted click chemistry, which could be rendered as a nanotheranostic agent for enhanced photothermal therapy in vivo.

novel drug formulations.sentence: The article does not specifically identify any novel drug formulations, but rather reports on the development of ZnDPA-conjugated Fe@Fe3O4 NPs for enhancing MRI and photothermal therapy in cancer treatment.
